Title: Relates to exempting contractors from the provisions of the Diesel Emissions Reduction Act 2006
Summary: Exempts contractors from the provisions of the "Diesel Emissions Reduction Act of 2006"; establishes that heavy duty vehicles used on behalf of state agencies and regional public authorities by contractors do not need to be powered by ultra low sulfur diesel fuel or best available retrofit technology.
LawCode: Amd ยง19-0323, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to exempting contractors from the provisions of the "Diesel Emissions Reduction Act 2006"
